column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The humble shaman offers you a warm smile.
Obtain a tear of Yx'Lokwa.
Slay a djinn for its core.
Deliver the tear of Yx'Lokwa and core of the djinn to the humble shaman.
Tell me, do you believe in the power of prayer?
What will you say?
Why yes, I do.
I beg your pardon?
Would you do me the honor of joining me in a small prayer for good fortune?
I intend to pray to the gods for good fortune. I would be most honored if you joined me.
We require two offerings to ensure our words reach to the heavens─a tear of Yx'Lokwa, and the heart of a djinn.
But your prayers are between you and the gods alone. As such, I cannot help you in preparing these offerings.
I will await your return. May the blessings of the wood keep you safe.
Procure a tear of Yx'Lokwa and the heart of a djinn, and we may deliver your prayers unto the heavens.
You have prepared your offerings, then?
Very good.
Now, we take the tears in hand, like so. We then use the heart of the djinn to summon a breeze to carry the tears─and our prayers─into the firmament.
Even now I can feel the gods' protection.
I suspect you will have need of it in the days ahead.
I suspect you will have need of it in the Qitana Ravel.
This too may prove useful in your travels. Until we meet again.
